name: Cisco_U_Tutorial-Jinja_Templating
description: A collection of Jinja template examples for the Cisco U Tutorial on Catalyst Center Jinja Templating.

templates.name: 02-07_02_The_fromjson_Filter
templates.author: ardonald

templateErrors.message: This command is reserved to be used by Cisco DNA Center
This command is reserved to be used by Cisco DNA Center

templates.name: 01-04_Special_Syntax
templates.author: ardonald

templates.name: 01-05_Catalyst_Center_Special_Keywords
templates.author: ardonald
templates.templateContent:
Enable Mode
***************************
#MODE_ENABLE
enable_mode_cli_command
enable_mode_cli_command
#MODE_END_ENABLE

Interactive Commands
***************************
#INTERACTIVE
no crypto pki trustpoint DNAC-CA<IQ>yes/no<R>yes
#ENDS_INTERACTIVE

Multi-Line Commands
***************************
<MLTCMD>command_line_1
command_line_2
command_line_3</MLTCMD>

Ignore Compliance Checks
***************************
! @start-ignore-compliance
no interface Loopback0
! @end-ignore-compliance
templates.promotedTemplateContent:
